scripts.build: npm --prefix ./region_picker/ run build; npm --prefix ./app/ run build; npm --prefix ./record_suggestion/ run build
scripts.devbuild: npm --prefix ./region_picker/ run devbuild; npm --prefix ./app/ run devbuild; npm --prefix ./record_suggestion/ run devbuild
scripts.install: npm --prefix ./region_picker/ install; npm --prefix ./app/ install; npm --prefix ./record_suggestion/ install
